summary: Yong Tai Berhad announces a variation to its proposed private placement, revising the indicative issue price to RM0.1520 per share and adjusting the utilization of proceeds due to changes in the share price.

utilisation_of_proceeds.use: Repayment of existing loan and borrowings
utilisation_of_proceeds.details: Repay term loans and bank overdraft with an effective average interest rate of 8.00% per annum.

utilisation_of_proceeds.use: Part financing of YTB Group's existing projects
utilisation_of_proceeds.details: Payment of outstanding progress claims to main contractors and suppliers for the Group's existing projects.
Support its working capital requirements for the Group's day-to-day operations.

utilisation_of_proceeds.use: Estimated expenses for the Proposed Private Placement
utilisation_of_proceeds.details: Fees payable to/for the relevant authorities, advisers and placement fees as well as other miscellaneous expenses.
